name: json-health-server
description: A simple JSON health and swagger server

scripts.docker:clean: docker stop health-server && docker rm health-server && docker rmi json-health
scripts.postdocker:run: docker ps --size | grep json-health && echo open localhost:3000
scripts.docker:rerun: npm run docker:clean || true && npm run docker:run

author: Mitch Allen <https://mitchallen.com
